## .jscpd.json

- Used by
- [Options](https://github.com/kucherenko/jscpd/tree/master/apps/jscpd#options)
- Example:

    ```json
    {
    "ignore": [
        "**/*.go,**/go-test*.yaml"
    ],
    "threshold": 10
    }
    ```
